metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1695 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Open Ticket Request System(OTRS) 3.1.x before 3.1.20, 3.2.x before 3.2.15, and 3.3.x before 3.3.5allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via acrafted HTML email.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1695` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 3.3.5-1
otrs2 - 3.3.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.5-1').
